Description: Fragment of the bezel of a green glazed composition integral finger-ring, with incised decoration, representing a facing head of Hathor
Curator's comments: W.M.F. Petrie, Tanis ii, Nebesheh and Defenneh, p. 75 § 72 : "A ring bezel of grey-blue glaze, almost like that of Tell el-Amarna, bears the head of Hat-hor (pl. xli. 41)".
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1888 / Tanis. Part II. Nebesheh (Am) and Defenneh (Tahpanhes) (p. 75 § 72, p. 111, pl. xli, 41)
Leclère and Spencer 2014 / Tell Dafana Reconsidered: The Archaeology of an Egyptian Frontier Town (p.68, p.182, pl.24)
